directorNamePublicRegisterInformationHea: What information we'll show on the public online register
directorNamePublicRegisterInformation: We will show the director’s full name on the public Companies House register. We will also show the director’s title, if relevant.
directorNameFirstNameHint: Enter the director's full first name.
directorNameMiddleNamesHint: Enter the director's full middle name or names.
directorNameTitleTypeaheadHint: Start typing a title, such as Dr or Professor, then choose from the list.
